summary: Few knew that Stalin spent his last night in the arms of a young Australian woman. Few still knew that their "love-child" brought Australia to the brink of civil war. Until now.
cast: Judy Davis|Sam Neill|F. keywords: woman wears eyeglasses|looking at oneself in a mirror|army|senate|prime minister
title: Hijos de la revolución
